HC Tang, Financial Enthusiast, Budgeting at The SocietyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 15 Sep 2018Sign up at stashaway website. They will ask you some question to determine your risk profile and investment goals. You can set as many different goals as you want. ​Next ,  bank transfer $ into your set goals either lump sum or via monthly installments. ​They have mobile apps allow you to check performance, details of each goals and the investment components. You can adjust your risk profile for each goals. ​your investment compounds with your monthly contribution and dividends are reinvested. 0 comments0
